name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The account id.

name: username
description: Description: The username of the account, not including domain.

name: acct
description: Description: The Webfinger account URI. Equal to username for local users, or username@domain for remote users.

name: url
description: Description: The location of the user’s profile page.

name: display_name
description: Description: The profile’s display name.

name: note
description: Description: The profile’s bio or description.

name: avatar
description: Description: An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile.

name: avatar_static
description: Description: A static version of the avatar. Equal to avatar if its value is a static image; different if avatar is an animated GIF.

name: header
description: Description: An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards.

name: header_static
description: Description: A static version of the header. Equal to header if its value is a static image; different if header is an animated GIF.

name: locked
description: Description: Whether the account manually approves follow requests.

name: fields
description: Description: Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs.

name: emojis
description: Description: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile.

name: bot
description: Description: Indicates that the account may perform automated actions, may not be monitored, or identifies as a robot.

name: group
description: Description: Indicates that the account represents a Group actor.

name: discoverable
description: Description: Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory.

name: noindex OPTIONAL
description: Description: Whether the local user has opted out of being indexed by search engines.

name: moved OPTIONAL
type: Type: NULLABLE Account, or null if the profile is suspended.
description: Description: Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account.

name: suspended OPTIONAL
description: Description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.

name: limited OPTIONAL
description: Description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behind a warning screen.

name: created_at
description: Description: When the account was created.

name: last_status_at
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 8601 Date), or null if no statuses
description: Description: When the most recent status was posted.

name: statuses_count
description: Description: How many statuses are attached to this account.

name: followers_count
description: Description: The reported followers of this profile.

name: following_count
description: Description: The reported follows of this profile.
